member.name: M:MasterCompany.Controllers.EmployeeController.GetAllEmployees
member.summary: Get all Employees without any filter (includes repeat employees).
member.returns: Returns the list of employee (repeated included).

member.name: M:MasterCompany.Controllers.EmployeeController.GetEmployeesNoDuplicated
member.returns: Returns the list of employee without repeat.

member.name: M:MasterCompany.Controllers.EmployeeController.GetEmployeesWithIncrease
member.summary: Get all Employees with increase of salary and without repeat.
member.returns: Returns the list of employee with increase of salary and without repeat.

member.name: M:MasterCompany.Controllers.EmployeeController.GetSexStatistics
member.summary: //Show the porcent of male and female employees.
member.returns: Returns a string with the porcent of male and female employees.

member.name: M:MasterCompany.Controllers.EmployeeController.GetEmployeesInRange(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Get Employees in Range, filter by min and max Salary.
member.returns: Returns the list of employee in the range.

member.name: M:MasterCompany.Controllers.EmployeeController.DeleteEmployee(System.String)
member.summary: Delete an employee from the active list.
member.param: Number of document of the employee.

member.name: M:MasterCompany.Controllers.EmployeeController.DisableEmployee(System.String)
member.summary: Removes the employee from the active list and adds them to the inactive list.
member.param: Number of document of the employee.
